text: - innogy Czech Republic is energy company.
We are a market leader in sales of gas,

and we are also big player
in electricity sales.
Our mission is to deliver modern solutions
to our customers.
Working with AWS did allow us
to decommission our legacy data centers,

which brings us to the
modern times of the cloud.

When I compare on-premise
data centers with cloud,
the biggest benefit for us is flexibility,
which is delivered by the cloud.
When we need to test a new application,
we can create service in the cloud.
After finishing the work,

we can again delete them
without leaving unused hardware
in on-premise data center.
We are now eight years with AWS,
and it is safe.
We just like it.
It works.
We do not face any issues.
And it is secure.

So last year, we did introduce
a chatbot or voicebot,

how we call it, which is
used in our call center

for receiving the calls of
our customers over the night.
And we are now working on research
how to introduce artificial intelligence

and machine learning into the
services for our customers.
One of the AWS services we are using
in this area is CodeWhisperer,
which is being used by our developers.
Biggest impact of migration to AWS was

for us possibility to
decrease the complexity
of the on-premise world.

It did also allow us to
increase sustainability
and the green emissions.
(inspirational music)
